MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (int index, System.Web.Services.Description.PortType portType);
.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.Web.Services.Description.PortType portType) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which to insert the `portType` parameter.
The to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified to the at the specified zero-based index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
If the value of the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the specified <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType> instance is added to the end of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortTypeCollection>.
The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Remove (System.Web.Services.Description.PortType portType);
.method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.Services.Description.PortType portType) cil managed

Docs.param: The to remove from the collection.
Docs.summary: Removes the first occurrence of the specified from the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
The elements that follow the removed <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType> move up to occupy the vacated spot.
